Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to a city business tax surcharge in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Authorizes a city business tax surcharge of twenty-five percent on the tax liability imposed on any business subject to tax as a corporation, in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add Art 30-C ยง1350, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a city business tax surcharge in a city with a population of one million or more
